content: IMHO and without regard to what is or is not public property, it seems to me that neither Siegler nor the USC campus cops enhanced their reputations with this confrontation. Keystone Cops meet Donald Duck ... While USC is definitionally a private college, one heck of a lot of taxpayer dollars go to it in the form of grants of one kind or another.
